title: Engagement-Oriented Science Learning Design in Technology-Enhanced Classrooms (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and basic proficiency in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Process promoting real-time interaction and collaborative learning in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners actively participate in science topic discussions using real-time chat tools, contributing meaningful opinions ≥3 times weekly.
Learners can revise and improve science experiment hypotheses with ≥80% accuracy through a peer assessment system.
Learners evaluate the credibility of scientific information using three criteria by analyzing feedback loops based on social media.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
